body_html: I have noticed this issue for long. See #11160. The predefined weights seem to be essentially random in tf.contrib.keras and issues do not seem to get much attention. After some time trying to port my keras models to tf.contrib.keras, I have moved to tf-slim models/api which is excellent.

body: I have noticed this issue for long. See [https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/11160](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/11160). The predefined weights seem to be essentially random in tf.contrib.keras and issues do not seem to get much attention.  After some time trying to port my keras models to tf.contrib.keras, I have moved to tf-slim models/api which is excellent.
